PartyScreeningStep.name: PartyScreeningStep
PartyScreeningStep.description: Represents information about the screening process conducted for a party.

DisclaimerText.description: The disclaimer text received for the party profile screening.

IntegrationProviderExecId.description: The integration provider execution that's associated with the party screening step.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MatchedFieldList.description: Specifies the fields that matched during the party profile screening.

Name.description: The name of the party screening step record.

ResponseCodeComment.description: The description of the response code.

ResultCode.description: The code received after the party profile screening is completed.

ScreeningSummaryId.description: The party screening summary record associated with this screening step.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the third-party party profile screening.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the third-party party profile screening.
